item.title: Vim Multiple Cursors to Insert Text
item.description: Quick blog for multiple cursor in Vim. For example we have the html below. <div id="id1">1</div> <div id="id2">2</div> <div id="id3">3</div> <div id="id4">4</div> And we want to insert same class after id for every div element. Here is what we do in Vim. First place cursor after id="id1". Use Ctrl-v, and jjj(move 3 lines below) to select visual block. Press I to switch to insert mode and start typing our class eg:class="my-class".
